>
[Vampiric Scythe](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1287)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Evil" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=64" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
<trait label="Negative" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=118" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 31

**Price** 3,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** 2
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Scythe](/Weapons.aspx?ID=39)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The blade of this _+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [wounding](/Equipment.aspx?ID=309) [scythe](/Weapons.aspx?ID=39)_ is sharp enough to produce a whistling sound when swung through the air. The shaft is made of ebony wood with a sickly shine to it, much like the shine of infected wounds and contaminated water.

**Activate** <actions string="Reaction" /> command;   **Trigger** An enemy critically succeeds at an attempt to [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=41) you;  **Effect** As the scythe leaves your hand, it drinks the triggering creature's blood. The creature must succeed at a DC 30 Fortitude save or become [drained 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10) (drained 3 on a critical failure). If the triggering creature becomes drained, you gain temporary Hit Points equal to the triggering creature's level. You lose any remaining temporary Hit Points after 1 minute.

**Activate** <actions string="Reaction" /> command;  **Frequency** once per hour; **Trigger** You critically succeed at a Strike against a living opponent;  **Effect** The scythe drains life essence from your opponent into you. You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half the slashing damage the scythe dealt to the foe. You lose any remaining temporary Hit Points after 1 minute. 

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Vampiric Scythe
